updates.description:
Core:
	- changed sorting algorythm for signature calculation to
	Intl.Collator('en', { ignorePunctuation: true })
	- added new key type 'NODES' which obtained as a result from BankValueSetFromUnit.
	So 'AnySimpleMap' will support maps like 'Zombie World: Reign of Chaos'

Zombie World Liberty:
	- updated to 0.145 (27.06.2024)
	- small design improvements

Core:
	- fixed signature calculation (some sections and keys were sorted incorrectly)

Exodus 3:
	- updated to 1.10 (29.02.2024)

Added map:
	- Exodus 3

Core:
	- added some sc2 implementations (ModI, StringFind, StringSub, StringWord)

Added map:
	- End of Dreams [fixed]

MineralZ Evolution [Updated]:
	- updated to version 12.0.1 (8 December 2023).
	- now max prestige can be 42+.

Zombie World Liberty:
	- updated to version 0.121 (19 November 2023).
	- now heroes prestige is limited correctly.

MineralZ Evolution [Updated] fixes:
	- Wins param is limited from 0 to 419
	- random stats generator improvement
	- removed unused keys from bank generator

Zombie World Liberty:
	- updated to version 0.112 (2 November 2023)
	- fixed Best Solo selector bug

Runling Run 4 and 8:
	- fixed Unit selectors bug

Player:
	- music doesn't play on first visit, when help modal is active
	- added more musics

Design:
	- Updates window improvements

MineralZ Evolution [Updated] fixes:
	- now you can get the last probe
	- Hell nights will not removed, if no impossible nights

Core:
	- updated some SC2 math functions

Design:
	- background slides now change smoothly

Added map:
	- MineralZ Evolution [Updated]

General improvements:
	- esm format
	- dynamic module loading

Core:
	- added SC2 ModF() implementation

Small fixes/improvements
Some new music â™ª

Editor:
	- fixed bankName and Author ID inputs

Core:
	- added 'point' key type and some improvements

Design:
	- fixed invalid default background path

Design fixes
Added some new sounds

Zombie World Liberty:
	- fixed bank reader (drop area)
	- checksum improvements, now more combinations are valid

Design:
	- popups improvement
	- updated help window
	- Accounts ui improvements

Added map:
	- Zombie World Liberty

Editor:
	- fixed player id input field for NA and Asian regions

Player improvements

Zombie World Unity:
	- increased max values for killz

Some design improvements

Added maps:
	- Zombie World Unity
	- Any Simple (Web version of BankSigner.exe)

Features:
	- account manager (quick change Player id and load all saved banks for this account)
	- update checker (shows a notification when a new version is released)

Some code improvements

Added map:
	- Swarm Special Forces

Feature:
	- 8bit Player

Bank cache improvements
Fixes, optimizations, sounds

First release

Added maps:
	- Runling Run 4
	- Runling Run 8
	- Zombie City

Feature:
	- saving edited bank in local storage
